## Lesson goals and objectives

### Learning goals

<!--
High-level "big picture" objectives of the learning process.
This should be no more than 3 bullet points.
-->

- Describe the steps of a simple differential expression workflow.
- Understand the motivation for each step in a differential expression workflow.
- Explain how to adjust the workflow according to the experimental design.

### Learning objectives

<!--
